p:
In the experimental datasets, coesite-III was often found together with either coesite-II or coesite-IV. When coesite-II and coesite-III are found together, orientations of their
b
* axes coincide, implying that lattice planes (0 1 0) of the two crystals should be parallel to each other. In the case of coesite-III and coesite-IV, we observed that the reciprocal plane a*b* of coesite-III coincides with the a* c* plane of coesite-IV. Then the
c lattice vector of coesite-III and the
b lattice vector of coesite-IV should be colinear.
